abstract: Verizon is trying to head off federal regulation of exclusive cellphone deals.
snippet: Verizon is trying to head off federal regulation of exclusive cellphone deals.
lead_paragraph: Verizon Wireless said Friday that it would let small wireless companies have access to some of the cellphones that it offers exclusively to its customers under contracts with phone makers. The move is an attempt to head off federal regulation of such exclusive handset deals.

headline.main: Verizon Plans to Offer Some of Its Cellphones to Small Wireless Companies
headline.print_headline: Verizon Plans to Offer Some of Its Cellphones to Small Wireless Companies
